mapper.select: SELECT xt_number_id, lastvalue, version, createTime, lastUpdateTime, modulesType FROM xt_number WHERE 1=1
SELECT xt_number_id, lastvalue, version, createTime, lastUpdateTime, modulesType FROM xt_number WHERE modulesType = #{modulesType}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO xt_number ( xt_number_id, lastvalue, version, createTime, lastUpdateTime, modulesType ) VALUES ( #{xt_number_id}, #{lastvalue}, #{version}, #{createTime}, #{lastUpdateTime}, #{modulesType} )
mapper.update: UPDATE xt_number SET lastvalue = #{lastvalue}, version = version+1, lastUpdateTime = #{lastUpdateTime} WHERE modulesType=#{modulesType} AND version = #{version}
